mapper.insert: insert into user_info(ui_id, ui_name, ui_pwd, ui_nick, ui_support, ui_email, ui_tell) values(#{ui_id}, #{ui_name}, #{ui_pwd}, #{ui_nick}, #{ui_support}, #{ui_email}, #{ui_tell})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_info where ui_id = #{ui_id}
select ui_no, ui_id from user_info where ui_id = #{ui_id} and ui_pwd = #{ui_pwd}
select ui_id, ui_name, ui_nick, ui_support, ui_email, ui_tell from user_info where ui_no = #{ui_no}
